description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(90).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,38,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (1 +2*x -x^2)/(x^4 -38*x^2 +1). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 12 2013a(n) = 38*a(n-2) - a(n-4), - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 12 2013
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[90],30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 20 2013 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1 + 2 x - x^2)/(x^4 - 38 x^2 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 12 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 2, 37, 76]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 38*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 12 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
